head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NOLAN, RAYMOND E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NOLAN, RAYMOND E.

block.p: NOLAN-Raymond E. June 5, 2000. After a brief illness at the Jersey Shore Medical Center, Neptune, NJ. Devoted husband of Diane (nee Young). Beloved brother of Brendan. Mr. Nolan had a career in hospital financial administration and public accounting. ReposingJohn J. Barrett Funeral Home, 424 W.51 St. NYC, 3-5 & 7-9 PM, Fri. Funeral Mass 10:30 AM Saturday St. Paul the Apostle RC Church.
